p:
On the other hand, many chalcone derivatives (compound 1
47 , compound 2
48 , and compound 3
49 ) along with pyrazole derivatives (compound 4
50 and compound 5
51 ) and piperazine derivatives (compound 6
52 and compound 7
53 ) display potential inhibitory activity of VEGFR-2 kinase which is an essential factor in angiogenesis ( Figure 1). Thus, chalcone and analogues demonstrated potential inhibitory activity of VEGFR could be considered as important cancer prevention targets
54â€“56 .
